content:
AccessRights AccessRights Enum

In this Article

Edit

Specifies the possible access rights for a user.

Syntax

Declaration

public enum AccessRightsPublic Enum AccessRights

Fields

Listen
Listen

Right to receive messages only.
Manage
Manage

Allows management operations such as udpating and deleting on the notification hub. Manage also include Send and Listen rights.
Send
Send

Right to send messages only.

Details

Namespace

Microsoft.Azure.NotificationHubs.Messaging

Assembly

Microsoft.Notifications.dll
